template.name: Atoms and basis sets
template.comment:
Atoms and basis sets --------------------
Number of atom types: 1 Total number of atoms: 3
Basis set used is "aug-cc-pVDZ" from the basis set library.
label atoms charge prim cont basis ---------------------------------------------------------------------- OS 1 8 35 23 [10s5p2d|4s3p2d] OP 2 8 35 23 [10s5p2d|4s3p2d] ---------------------------------------------------------------------- total: 3 24 105 69 ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Spherical harmonic basis used.
Threshold for integrals: 1.00D-15
